title: Key Account Representative - Scheels - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-25-2015 Brief Job Description: Using strong business acumen and retail math abilities drive the top and bottom line number for the account. Drive account growth and profitability by assessing and building on areas of momentum, capitalize on No   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
